channel.title: Problems with port forwarding
channel.description:
<Read the Whole thing>
I Recently tried to port forward for my server and when I try to go to 192.168.1.1 I type for the pass word admin and the user name blank, it just comes up again and I do the same thing it happens three times then I get a page that says "401 Authorization Required" Then I tried to use the user name admin and the pass blank, still it went to that authorization page. Then I tried using the username and pass admin and it still went to the authorization page. So I asked my parent if they set a password for the router. They said they didn't do anything with the routers user and pass. Does any one know where on my router or computor to find the user and pass for my router?
- Boring
